cards.name: Jon Arryn
cards.text: Insight. Renown. Forced Interrupt: When Jon Arryn is killed, each player may draw 2 cards or gain 1 power.

cards.name: Prince of the Narrow Sea
cards.text: Unique [baratheon] character only. If attached character is Salladhor Saan, he gains renown and the Commander trait. Reaction: After you lose initiative, return a Smuggler character to your hand to choose and kneel a character and a location with a lower printed cost. -1 Initiative.

cards.name: The Reader's Septon
cards.text: Action: Kneel The Reader's Septon to choose a player. Swap the top and bottom card of that player's deck.

cards.name: Torrhen's Square
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After a [greyjoy] card comes out of shadows, kneel your faction card. For each Raider character you control, discard the top card of each opponent's deck who has an equal or higher initiative value than you. -2 Initiative.

cards.name: The Halfman's Horde
cards.text: Assault. Intimidate. No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Halfman's Horde is attacking, discard 1 card at random from the losing opponents hand for each other unique attacking Clansman character.

cards.name: The Warden of the West
cards.text: [lannister] Lord character only. Attached character gains the Commander trait. Reaction: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent's hand during the challenges phase, if you do not support that player, draw cards equal to the amount of cards discarded (to a maximum of 3 cards). (Limit once per round).

cards.name: Doran Martell
cards.text: Shadow (5). Insight. Each card in your shadow area gains shadow (X). X is that card's printed cost. Reaction: After you lose dominance, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Place 1 into shadows and place the other on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: A Traitor's Whisper
cards.text: Play only if you have a card with shadows in your discard pile. Action: Choose and reveal a card in each player's shadows area, if able. You may put these cards into play.

cards.name: Craster's Keep Mutineer
cards.text: Reaction: After Craster's Keep Mutineer enters play, choose and discard a duplicate on a character in play.

cards.name: Defensive Debris
cards.text: Bestow (2). Attached character gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Discard 1 gold from Defensive Debris to choose a card in an opponents discard pile. Until the end of the phase, cards with that printed cost cannot be played or put into play. (Max once per phase.)

cards.name: Crannogmen
cards.text: Shadow (4). Stealth. Reaction: After a House Reed card enters play, place a poison token on a character controlled by an opponent. Then, if the number of poison tokens are equal or higher than that characters STR, return Crannogmen to shadows to kill it. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: The Wolf's Den
cards.text: Reaction: After a character you control is sacrificed or killed, kneel The Wolf's Den to place the bottom card of your deck into shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.

cards.name: Lysono Maar
cards.text:
Insight.
During the first challenge you initiate each phase, your opponent may declare defenders before you declare attackers, and cannot declare defenders after you declare attackers.
cards.designer: Card design by 2017 European Joust Champion, Reinhard Schefcik.

cards.name: The Balerion
cards.text: While you control Captain Groleo, he gains a [power] icon and stealth. Challenges Action: Kneel The Balerion and shuffle it into your deck to choose a [targaryen] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains assault.

cards.name: Ser Robar Royce
cards.text:
Ser Robar Royce cannot be declared as an attacker or defender during the first challenge initiated by you, and the first challenge initiated against you.
-1 Initiative.
cards.flavor: Ser Robar had hung back, uncertain, but now he was reaching for his hilt.

cards.name: A Wall of Roses
cards.text: Reaction: After an attacking character is removed from a challenge, choose X defending characters (cannot be 0). If you win this challenge, gain 2 power and stand each of those characters.

cards.name: Knights of the Vale
cards.text: Assault. Renown. No attachments. Challenges Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a defending House Arryn character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +3 STR (double its STR instead if your initiative value is 0).

cards.name: Littlefinger
cards.text: Insight. Reaction: After you win a challenge, each player must choose a card from their hand or shadows area, if able. Then, reveal the chosen cards. If your revealed card is a different card type to the others, stand Littlefinger and have him gain 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Anya Waynwood
cards.text: While you control Harry the Heir, he gains renown. Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you, kneel a neutral location to kneel and take control of an attacking character with equal or lower printed cost until the end of the challenge. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Sweetrobin
cards.text: Interrupt: When a card with a printed cost equal to or lower than it's owners initiative value is revealed, remove it from the game. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Alayne Stone
cards.text: Stealth. If you control Sansa Stark, attach Alayne Stone to her as a duplicate. While Alayne Stone is standing during the challenges phase, each player cannot trigger card abilities on in-faction Lord or Lady characters they control.

cards.name: Harry the Heir
cards.text: While you control Anya Waynwood, she gets +1 STR for each power on Harry the Heir. Reaction: After a location you control is knelt by the effect of a card you control during a challenge, stand it. Then, if it has the House Arryn trait, stand Harry the Heir. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Mord
cards.text: Action: Kneel Mord to choose a character in play or a card in shadows. Until Mord stands or leaves play, treat it's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits) and have it lose all keywords.

cards.name: Nestor Royce
cards.text: While each opponent has a higher initiative value than you, Nestor Royce gains renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Nestor Royce is attacking, kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to stand him. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Maester Colemon
cards.text: Dominance Action: Kneel a unique Maester character to choose a Condition or Item attachment with a lower printed cost. Take control of that attachment and move it to another eligible character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Ser Vardis Egen
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Ser Vardis Egen is defending, sacrifice him to place an attacking non-Army character into shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost.

cards.name: Benjicot
cards.text: Insight. Forced Reaction: After Benjicot stands, reveal the bottom card of each player's deck. Add each card that shares a Trait with Benjicot to it's owners hand and discard the others.

cards.name: Lord Protector's Retainer
cards.text: Interrupt: When an opponent chooses a Lord or Lady character you control as the only target of a triggered ability, Lord Protector's Retainer becomes the target of that triggered ability instead. (Max once per phase.)

cards.name: Winged Knight
cards.text: While the attacking player has a higher initiative value than you, Winged Knight does not kneel when declared as a defender. Interrupt: When a Lord or Lady character is killed, remove Winged Knight from the game to place that character on the bottom of its owner's deck instead of placing it in their dead pile.

cards.name: Gulltown Merchant
cards.text: Marshalling Action: Kneel Gulltown Merchant to reduce the cost of the next House Arryn card you marshal or play this phase by 1.

cards.name: The Eyrie
cards.text: While The Eyrie is standing, each opponent who has more power than you cannot initiate more than 2 challenges against you during the challenges phase. Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, kneel The Eyrie to choose an opponent to become first player. -2 Initiative. +1 Reserve.

cards.name: The Bloody Gate
cards.text: While The Bloody Gate is standing, each player cannot put more than than 1 character into play using card abilities each phase. Forced Reaction: After you win initiative, kneel a Guard character you control, or The Bloody Gate. -1 Initiative +1 Reserve

cards.name: The Vale of Arryn
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, draw 1 card for each defending House Arryn character you control (to a maximum of 5). -2 Initiative.

cards.name: The Highroad
cards.text: Limited. Action: Kneel and sacrifice The Highroad to reduce the cost of the next non-character card you marshal or play this phase by 2. +1 Income.

cards.name: Lord Protector of the Vale
cards.text: Non-loyal Lord character only. Attached character gains the House Arryn trait. If attached character is Littlefinger, he gains stealth. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, draw 1 card for each challenge initiated this phase in which you were not the losing player (to a maximum of 3 cards).

cards.name: Lysa's Letter
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a player and name a challenge type. While that player has not initiated a challenge of that type this phase, set the claim value on their revealed plot card to 0 until the end of the phase.

cards.name: The Seed is Strong
cards.text: Play only if you control a unique House Arryn character or Stannis Baratheon. Reaction: After you lose initiative, the winning opponent must choose and discard a Lord or Lady character from their hand or shadows area unless they reveal a hand and shadows area containing no Lord or Lady characters.

cards.name: The Defiance of Duskendale
cards.text: During a challenge, each non-Stronghold location controlled by the defending player gains the Contested trait. Forced Reaction: After a non-limited Contested location is knelt by assault or a non-character ability, discard it from play.

cards.name: Wardens of the East
cards.text: Each player cannot play in-faction events and plays with each card in shadows revealed.

cards.name: Banner of the Falcon
cards.text: Increase the cost of the first in-faction card each player plays, ambushes or brings out of shadows each round by 1. While each opponent has a higher initiative value than you, each House Arryn character you control gets +1 STR.
